name: Trotter Tom Yum Soup
description: What can you do with a pig's foot, lemongrass, and a few bird's eye chilies?  Make trotter tom yum, that's what!  Imagine the spicy and sour flavors of tom yum with the richness of pork.
recipeIngredient: 1 stalk lemon grass, cut into 2-inch sections and bruised slightly
rice noodles cooked according to instructions on package

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse trotters under running water. Place trotters in large saucepot pot and cover with water. Simmer until trotters are tender, about 2 1/2 hours, skimming off whatever meat scum rises to the top.
Add lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and chilies and simmer for 30 minutes longer. Remove the aromatics from the pot and discard. Add sliced vegetables and simmer 5 minutes longer.
Add chili paste (if desired), fish sauce, and lime juice, adding more or less according to taste. Serve with rice noodles and additional segments of lime.
